group.name: countries
group.html:
Layer Countries Description: European countries Source: Digital Chart of the World (DCW)
License: Public domain data from U.S. government are freely distributable with proper source attribution or metadata.

group.name: cities10000eu
group.html:
European placenames Description: European cities with population > 10000 Source: http://www.geonames.org
License: The dataset is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License

group.name: rivers
group.html:
Rivers Description: Major rivers in Europe. Source: Digital Chart of the World (DCW)
License: Public domain data from U.S. government are freely distributable with proper source attribution or metadata.

group.name: water
group.html:
Water Description: Perennial inland water for Europe. Source: Digital Chart of the World (DCW)
License: Public domain data from U.S. government are freely distributable with proper source attribution or metadata.

group.name: urban
group.html:
Urbanized Areas Description: The major urbanized areas are depictions of the largest urbanized areas of Europe. They represent the shape of the major urbanized area as viewed from the air. These outlines do not necessarily conform to political boundaries. Source: Digital Chart of the World (DCW)
License: Public domain data from U.S. government are freely distributable with proper source attribution or metadata.
